content:
nutin-new
// or
create-nutin-app

// Flags
-h --help
-d --defaults
-pm --package-manager <manager>
--no-template // Use inline templates
--no-stylin-nutin // Do not use built-in SCSS utility
--testin-nutin // Use testin-nutin toolkit
--no-i18n // Do not use i18n
--transition // Use animated view transitions. Note: May interfere with CSS `position: fixed`, `z-index`...
// Defaults
--template // Use external templates
--stylin-nutin // Use built-in SCSS utility classes & mixins
--i18n // Use i18n
--no-testin-nutin // Do not use testin-nutin toolkit
--no-transition // Do not use animated view transitions
